snippet: Tim Tebow and his down-field pass has provided another wrinkle for the Patriots to consider in their A.F.C. playoff game.
abstract: Denver Broncos quarterback Tim Tebow's down-field pass to clinch wild-card victory over the Pittsburgh Steelers has provided another wrinkle for the New England Patriots to consider as they prepare to face Denver in AFC playoff game.
lead_paragraph: Tim Tebow and his down-field pass has provided another wrinkle for the Patriots to consider in their A.F.C. playoff game.

headline.main: Tebow Stretches Field and Maybe His Limits
headline.print_headline: Tebow Stretches Field and Maybe Limits
